citations.narrative:
A current record of rabbits on hand was not available for review during this inspection. There were no sale records
present since March of 2023. A total of 8 adult rabbits, 7 weanlings, and 6 newborns were counted at time of inspection.
Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to assess the heath of the rabbit colony by identifying animal losses
by decreased number of rabbits born, raised, sold, died or euthanized. Licensee must maintain records containing the
required information for animals which disclose the number of rabbits held, owned, acquired or disposed of including
births and deaths. Correct by August 28, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of rabbits on hand was not available for review during this inspection. There were no sale records 
present since March of 2023. A total of 8 adult rabbits, 7 weanlings, and 6 newborns were counted at time of inspection. 
Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to assess the heath of the rabbit colony by identifying animal losses 
by decreased number of rabbits born, raised, sold, died or euthanized. Licensee must maintain records containing the 
required information for animals which disclose the number of rabbits held, owned, acquired or disposed of including 
births and deaths. Correct by August 28, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member. 
 
 n
